content: जीर्ण {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [जॄ-क्त] {@--1@} Old, ancient. {@--2@} Worn out, ruined, wasted, decayed, tattered (as clothes); वासांसि जीर्णानि यथा विहाय <ls>Bg. 2. 22</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 38</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 30.</ls> {@--3@} Digested; सुजीर्णमन्नं सुविचक्षणः सुतः <ls>H. 1. 22.</ls> --र्णः {@--1@} An old man. {@--2@} A tree. {@--3@} Cuminseed. --णा Large cumin-seed. --र्णं {@--1@} Benzoin. {@--2@} Old age, decrepitude.
